Description:
Affordable weekend block situated only 200m from river reserve & waterfront
Quarter acre allotment very close to the Loddon river. An opportunity to secure this perfect weekend block that's approximately 200 metres to the river reserve and the waterfront access. Situated in the riverside village of Newbridge that boasts a general store/post office that caters to all needs and the iconic Newbridge Hotel.
Peace and tranquility is assured here with access to fishing and meandering walking tracks. The block is zoned "Farming Zone" but for a weekend getaway you could bring your tiny house or caravan. Services available are electricity and phone. There is no town water or town sewerage. The block is actually accessed from Parker Street, there is no road, it is a grassed road reserve access. The block is adorned by a very old and quite large peppercorn tree that sits on road reserve boundary side. A level allotment in a quiet location, just waiting for you.

Description:
Blue Chip Location, Renovated & Flexible Floorplan
Eumeralla Nestled in one of Bendigos finest locations this 3 or 4 bedroom (if required) home has been renovated and modernised for today's living. Features include 3 traditional bedrooms, all with built in robes and ensuite to main, a rumpus off the living area, that if re-configured and converted could be utilised as the fourth bedroom with access from the hallway, large open plan living/dining, modern kitchen with breakfast bar, dishwasher and 900mm stainless steel cooker, plus modern 3 piece family bathroom. For comfort the home includes ducted heating and cooling plus 2 refrigerated reverse cycle split air-conditioners, and for efficiency the home boasts cost saving solar. From the living area the property extends out to a large entertaining deck with the property also including a double carport with remote door and store room. This is a walk everywhere location being minutes from the CBD, St Josephs Primary, Quarry Hill Primary, the train station, shopping and eateries. This is a lifestyle location rich in stunning period architecture and all the amenties beautiful Bendigo has to offer nearby.

Description:
Oasis in Strathfieldsaye.
Hidden Meadows is a limited land release in a desirable location, nestled between Guys Hill Road and Strathfieldsaye Road.
The final lot left is cleared, flat and fully serviced to expedite your building project. Strathfieldsaye offers families a quality lifestyle with proximity to the city, as well as excellent local services
catering to all your needs.
Surrounded by established homes, be sure not to miss out on this final lot.
Contact Ben Harper on 0477 277 564.

Description:
Golden opportunity in great location!
With loads of character, this partially renovated property has an awesome yard and is walking distance to schools, shops, pubs and the CBD. If this is what you are after, look no further.
Sizeable three bedrooms plus bungalow /office / study, original features including open fireplace, plus additional heating / cooling, timber floors, the list goes on!
There's a great outdoor entertaining area with built in bar and a massive bath to unwind at the end of the day, plus a great garden area for the dogs or kids.
The market is piping hot right now, and properties like this are hard to find. Interested, Give Matt Connelly a call today!
(ENOE)

Description:
Move in ready
This fantastically well-presented four-bedroom plus study home is located in a quiet cul de sac. Enclosed by a low maintenance yard and gardens, the home is cleverly designed and built.
The master bedroom has ensuite and walk-in robe, the remaining three with built-in robes. Ducted heating and cooling throughout plus split systems in master and family rooms. A spacious open floor plan, the kitchen has generous bench space, ample storage to delight the chef in all of us and benefits from plenty of natural light. Heading outside you will find the double garage with one roller door and remote, canvas blinds, secure backyard, paved entertaining area and beautiful gardens. This home is sure to impress investors, families or retirees. Close to schools, shops, public transport and less than five minutes from Bendigo's CBD.
Additional features:
- Spacious master bedroom with walk-in robe
- Four bedrooms and two bathrooms
- Light-filled kitchen with ample bench space
- Three spacious bedrooms, all with built-in robes
- Ducted heating and cooling throughout the property
- 3 KW Solar system
- Two-car lockable garage
- Close to local shopping, schools and other amenities
- And much, much more..

Description:
CHARMING COTTAGE
Set in a quiet location is this four bedroom charming period home which is situated on a large allotment of approx. 1100 sq mts with plenty of potential for extension or subdivision (STCA). The home consists of a cozy lounge, kitchen/meals, bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. The features include modernized kitchen and bathroom, gas heating and split system to keep you comfortable all year round and solar panel system. Outside you will find a double carport, entertaining area, big garage/workshop with concrete floor and power. Conveniently located close to schools, public transport, with great access to the Eaglehawk shopping Centre, this property presents a fantastic opportunity for the first home buyer, astute investor or home owner.

Description:
CUTE, COSY & COMFORTABLE
Set on its own title and providing a fabulous alternative to unit living is this compact, cosy and comfortable home ideal for singles or first home buyers alike. Affordable and very low maintenance, the property offers an established and secure corner allotment that is convenient to transport, the local supermarket, and other essential amenities nearby.
Featuring a recently updated interior, the home is ready now to move in and enjoy with nothing more to do. A well-proportioned floor plan consists of two carpeted bedrooms, both with built in robes and ceiling fans, and positioned close to the central bathroom which includes shower over bath. At the heart of the home is the open plan kitchen living and dining area, with timber look vinyl cladding adorning the floors throughout. The living space is generous and has split system heating and cooling unit as back up to the ducted heating and air-conditioning that flows throughout. The kitchen has been nicely renovated and features gas cooking facilities, pantry and ample cupboard and bench space. Completing the internal layout at the rear is the good sized laundry with storage and toilet.
Outside, the property has a low maintenance garden and lawn area at the front, secured from the road by good fencing all way round. There is a single carport providing off street parking, garden shed at the rea, and room for alfresco entertaining and a small dog possible.
Fully renovated and without the hefty price tag, this little charmer is available with vacant possession as soon as it suits. With little to do but settle in and enjoy your new surrounds, it all starts with an inspection today!

Description:
Close to the Heart
Character meets modern contemporary style in this renovated 3-bedroom, 2 bathroom home, easy walking to La Trobe University, Bendigo South East College, Strath Village Shopping Centre, and Kennington Reservoir and only 3kms from the Bendigo CBD.
Through the front gates at the front of this property, you will see a very established and attractive front façade with a row of magnolia trees which frame the Merbau portico what a perfect spot to enjoy your morning cuppa!
This north facing home is light and bright, with high 9ft ceilings, square set cornices, and downlights throughout additionally with a 13ft raked ceiling in the living area gives the additional feel of openness and space.
The main bedroom is large in size with built-in robes, a ceiling fan, and ensuite with a luxurious tiled shower, floating vanity, and toilet. The other two bedrooms are carpeted with built-in robes and ceiling fans.
Timber look vinyl planks lead to the open plan living/meals and kitchen with gas cooktop, electric under bench oven, dishwasher, canopy rangehood, and microwave recess.
The main bathroom is tiled with shower over bath, floating vanity, and toilet.
Gas Heating and Reverse Cycle Split system service the home.
Double doors open onto the undercover entertaining area with Jarrah decking and built-in bar which overlooks the easy to maintain established gardens, creating a private oasis. Further to the backyard is a concreted outdoor space for those chilly nights by the outdoor fire.
The workshop has built-in bench space, concrete flooring, and power.
Absolutely nothing more to do, this home is ready for its new owner to enjoy the rewards of a modern renovation in a very sought after area of Bendigo.
Inspections by private inspection only, photo ID required.
If you are located within a Stage 4 Lockdown area, please call to arrange a Facetime inspection.

Description:
FANTASTIC FAMILY HOME
Situated in a very sought after location and surrounded by quality homes. This wonderful property offers heaps of space to live and study / work from home in these crazy times. Offering four bedrooms, three bathrooms, study, formal lounge and a separate rumpus room with its own office and 4th toilet. The main bathroom and kitchen have been very tastefully updated. Set on a block of just under 1,000 meters with a great street appeal and heaps of privacy and great views from a number of rooms. Out the back there's space and privacy for you to relax with a covered tiled deck looking over the inground pool which is solar heater and salt chlorinated. A very productive vegie garden, 15,000 litre rainwater storage, garden shed and workshop complete the picture.
This is a very comfortable home in a very handy location.

Description:
Thoughtfully Renovated & Ready To Enjoy
In such a fantastic location at 217 Neale Street, you have so many amenities at your doorstep: 1 kilometre to La Trobe University, 2km to Kennington Village, 2.5km to Bendigo Market Place and 3km to the Bendigo CBD. Not to mention a short stroll to the Flora Hill Bakery and Butcher!
The 1950's solid brick home, sits proudly on a corner allotment home and has been lovingly renovated. Featuring new kitchen, bathroom & laundry, all of which are sleek and stylish. The kitchen with ample storage and gas cooktop.
The home boasts beautiful 9 foot high ceilings and 2 of the 3 bedrooms offer built-in robes while the home is kept in comport with the aid of a split system in the main living zone.
Towards the rear of the property is a separate dining room, which opens up onto the neat and tidy rear deck and low maintenance back yard.
All the hard work has been done for you and there is nothing left to do but move in and enjoy. Or in such a fantastic location, rent out and reap the benefits.
Contact Briohny today for further information.

Description:
YOUR FAMILY'S FUTURE IS HERE!
With the shortage of land and demand for builders at an all time high in the region, why bother waiting when this beautiful established family home is ready to walk straight into and enjoy immediately! Perched on the high side of the road in a quiet family friendly pocket of Maiden Gully, the immaculately presented, modern home ticks all your desired boxes, and has a little something for everyone to enjoy! Add to this a fully manicured and landscaped 899m2 allotment, you are well on your way to securing your family's future!
Built in 2011, the extra spacious floor plan offers over 33 squares under roof, including 25+ of comfortable and flexible living. Boasting up to 5 large bedrooms (or four plus large study/home office), spacious master with full ensuite and his "n" hers walk in robe. A second bathroom and toilet service the remaining household. Living space is a design feature of the home, with two huge areas allowing space to spread out. The open plan section at the centre of the home encompasses the kitchen and sizeable dining area which will house the largest of dinner or celebratory gatherings. The well equipped kitchen is complete with an good cupboard and bench space, stone bench tops, pantry, and all the modern appliances inc. 900mm cooking facilities and dishwasher. Other notable features include ducted heating and cooling throughout, 3.2kw solar panel system, ducted vacuuming system, plenty of storage space and a double garage with auto door and mud room section.
Outside, there has been some serious time and dollars spent for you to relax, entertain and enjoy the outdoors! Alfresco entertaining/living is available for every season thanks to covered vantage points that span half the house. Private and sheltered from all the elements, just pick your spot depending on what time of year it is! The sparkling solar heated in-ground swimming pool will provide hours of entertainment for the kids and adults alike. There is side access for a vehicle, trailer or possibly your caravan, and for the gym enthusiast, tradesman or home handyman, the 6.5m x 10.5m powered shed includes lean-to double carport at the front, roller door access, and man cave corner with solid fuel heater! With all that + more, it leaves quite a big footprint on your block. However, what the home lacks in yard space to kick the footy, there are so many options nearby for the kids including bike/walking tracks, ovals and playgrounds.
Presentation is immaculate, the home is in excellent order, and the location convenient to primary and secondary schools and the local supermarket! You could not build and establish this for the asking price, so call now to inspect and avoid the stress of trying!
Insights: 4 Anteah Road, Maiden Gully VIC 3551 was last sold in 2015 and 45 other 4 bedroom house in Maiden Gully have recently been sold.

Description:
Timeless 80's Classic
First impressions of this 1980s home will instantly leave you with an appreciation of the architecture and design of this era. Strong, bold brickwork being one of the many features throughout that remains timeless and beautiful. The transformation from past to present has seen some aspects of the original home remain the same whilst other areas have been revamped to meet the needs of modern day living. Sleek lighting design, stylish window furnishings and floor coverings are additions that create this modern tone through the open living area. The centre piece of the family hub is the sold brick mantle with wood fire heater, so warming and welcoming.
Spaciously designed, all bedrooms are generous and quite luxurious. Up to 3 children's bedrooms share a common Bathroom while the large Master suite extends to a full size en-suite. The original formal dining room is currently being utilised as the 4th bedroom.
True to the era, the Kitchen displays organisation with an abundance of cupboards, drawers and storage space. Timeless in presentation, the well-equipped work space features tiled splash backs, electric wall oven & hotplates, range hood, DW and concealed breakfast pantry, all considered to be quality items in a well-appointed kitchen of its time.
However, it is really the location and the lifestyle this property offers you that is most appealing. Set on 5047 sqm this includes - fenced paddock at the rear for pets or livestock, 6mx6m workshop/garage with concrete floor & power. Enclosed outdoor entertaining areas, large open spaces, side access and room to accommodate a caravan, boat or trailer. Being only 25 mins to Lake Eppalock, you can spend weekends enjoying your favourite water sports or a spot of fishing by the lake. Operate your business from home and create a work-life balance - the purpose-built study with built in shelving/work benches and cupboards is ideal in this Covid environment.
With future plans for development and subdivision of property nearby (STCA) , your investment here will continue to increase of in the future. With an excellent tenant currently in place and a return of $400 pw,( with vacant possession available) now is the time to reconsider your options and make the break from the city to the country.
Less than 2km to schools, sporting precincts, shopping centres, walking tracks, recreation reserves and community hubs. Strathfieldsaye has everything to offer.
Internal area
188m²

Description:
QUIET LOCALE WALKING DISTANCE TO EVERYTHING
Situated just minutes from schools, supermarkets, and all that Eaglehawk has to offer, 2/9 Bright Street is also only minutes from the Bendigo CBD.
The front door opens into the open plan lounge, dining, and kitchen area. This light, bright and sunny zone is spacious and versatile. The carpeted lounge area has an abundance of space and natural light.
Floating floorboards offer a seamless and low-maintenance connection to the rest of the house. The kitchen has quality finishes and an impressive amount of cupboard and bench space. Glass sliding doors open from the dining area onto a sunny decked area in the securely fenced back-yard.
Follow the downlit hallway and youll find the generously sized carpeted bedrooms. Both have built-in wardrobes with the rear bedroom enjoying northerly sunshine through a large window. At the end of the hallway is the fully tiled bathroom complete with full-sized bath, generous vanity, enclosed shower stall and an IXL
fan/heating unit. Also off the hall is the separate WC. With a door opening onto the rear courtyard, the generous laundry has a full-sized sink, bench space and built-in cabinetry.
Additional features include:
- Split system heating and cooling to the main living area
- Modern kitchen appliances including gas cooktop, electric oven
and dishwasher
- Secure remote lockup single garage with rear yard access.
Neat, tidy, central and tasteful. This property is a quality modern
build that doesnt disappoint.

Description:
Family Living at its Best!
This well presented, steel framed home is positioned in a quiet court on a 738m2 allotment (approx) & offers 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 separate living areas & fantastic outdoor space. The main bedroom is very roomy & contains a walk in robe & ensuite, whilst the 3 remaining bedrooms have built in robes & share easy access to the 3 piece family bathroom & separate toilet. The light & bright, open plan kitchen/dining/living area is the heart of the home. The kitchen contains modern appliances & abundant bench & cupboard space including a walk in pantry. The adjacent laundry provides more fabulous storage. A separate, large lounge/family room overlooks the inviting backyard & ducted heating & cooling & 3 split systems maintain all year round comfort throughout the home. Outside, you will find a secure yard featuring an undercover alfresco with ceiling fan, decked bbq area, established landscaping, brick planters ideal for growing vegetables or herbs & expansive lawn. There's also a good sized garden shed & the double garage provides internal access to the house. In this sought after location, close to schools, shops & transport & just a short drive to the CBD, this family friendly property will not disappoint!

Address: Lot 3 Mandurang South Road Mandurang South VIC 3551
Description:
PICTURESQUE ACREAGE JUST MINUTES FROM CITY
Property entrance opposite DALEY LANE, Mandurang South.
Located just 15 minutes from the centre of the city, with the granite outcrops and rolling hills flanking Mount Alexander in the distance, this acreage is the perfect opportunity to create the regional dream. Set on 13 acres (approx.) of lush land, the allotment includes established trees, a historic pear orchard and there is the potential for a dam thanks to a natural catchment at the front of the block.
With easy access to the road, this stunning pocket of land is positioned in a highly coveted area thanks to the beautiful aspect and proximity to both Bendigo services and Melbourne freeway connections.
Additional features include:
Power to the block
Natural catchment at front (potential for dam)
Pear orchard

Description:
PRIME MC IVOR HILL LAND
Located in the blue-ribbon McIvor Hill precinct, in a quiet cul-de-sac of established homes, this striking allotment has been held by the same family for many years. It is one of the very few vacant blocks left in this popular area and provides a unique opportunity for families or investors to secure a large, fully serviced block of approximately 1,059 square metres.
It's fully cleared, has all services available, fenced on two sides and sits beside a walking path through to the Herbert Avenue Playspace.
It's the ideal site to build your dream home with plenty of room for a pool and patio or subdivide/develop into luxury townhouses (STCA).
A short stroll will have you at Coles supermarket, The Bendigo Club, All Seasons Resort, Strathdale Community Centre and Park with its various playing fields, tennis club, Helen Jessen Early Learning Centre and Kennington Reservoir Reserve walking paths. This land is titled, therefore is available to immediately build on.
Call today for more details.

Description:
IMMACULATE ORIGINAL HOME IN LAKE NEANGAR PRECINCT
Positioned in a most sought-after location only a short stroll to Lake Neangar, Peter Krenz Leisure Centre, the rejuvenated sporting precinct and handy to bushland walking trails. You are hard-pressed to find a better location for the price.
This home is positioned on a large 880m2 lot and has been meticulously looked after by its loving owner for decades. It boasts a large carpeted lounge, separate meals space and a good-sized kitchen. The kitchen boasts gas upright cooker, double sink and plenty of cupboards for storage. Adjacent is the meals area which will house a six-seat table and the lounge is quite large and boasts a gas heatspace heater. All curtains and blinds are good quality and there is ample cooling throughout the home.
Bedrooms are all spacious and all have built in robes, there are ceiling fans and one bedroom has an air conditioner. The updated family bathroom includes a large 1500mm semi-frameless shower and vanity basin; the laundry has easy access to the side of the home.
Outside you will find everything in good order, the home has been landscaped and maintained, fencing is all excellent, there is a lovely fernery located on the west side of the house, out back is a covered alfresco space and side garden, there is a large powered garden shed and a 4m x 6m approx. powered workshop or garage with separate side access for vehicles and plenty of additional space on the 880m2 approx allotment.
Put simply, it is a fantastic home in mostly original but superb order on a sought-after large flat lot close to all those great facilities on offer around Lake Neangar.
